sentence.Network_en: I wasn't successful, so they looked down on me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一无所成，所以他们瞧不起我。

sentence.Network_en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
sentence.Network_cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

sentence.Network_en: Was he born to be successful, or did he just luck out?
sentence.Network_cn: 是他命中注定会成功，还是仅仅交了好运？

entry.tran: 达到目的的;有成效的;成功的
entry.def: Something that is successful achieves what it was intended to achieve. Someone who is successful achieves what they intended to achieve.

example.ex: How successful will this new treatment be?...
example.tran: 这一新的疗法会有多大成效？

example.ex: I am looking forward to a long and successful partnership with him...
example.tran: 我期盼着能与他建立长期而有成效的合作关系。

entry.tran: 获得成功的;受欢迎的;获利匪浅的
entry.def: Something that is successful is popular or makes a lot of money.

example.ex: ...the hugely successful movie that brought Robert Redford an Oscar for his directing...
example.tran: 让罗伯特·雷德福拿到了奥斯卡最佳导演奖的大受欢迎的影片

example.ex: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
example.tran: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

entry.def: Someone who is successful achieves a high position in what they do, for example in business or politics.

example.ex: Women do not necessarily have to imitate men to be successful in business...
example.tran: 女性不见得非要模仿男性才能在商界叱咤风云。

means.word_mean: 1. having succeeded or being marked by a favorable outcome;

auth_sentence.content: He was the son of a successful sugar planter.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was the son of a successful sugar planter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was the son of a successful sugar planter.

auth_sentence.content: It was always to be a successful racing driver.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was always to be a successful racing driver.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was always to be a successful racing driver.

auth_sentence.content: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Brotherhood proved to be a successful political group.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮

Sentence.sentence: The small paper is successful again.
But having made a successful purchase from, say, Amazon, they felt safe buying elsewhere.
Now with three places my main concern is keeping the business successful and running smoothly.
Talent,charm,and an exceptional work ethic have rarely hurled any one of world's most successful entertainment icons and the first African-American female billionaire.
It has not been very successful.
One free social networking website turned out to successful because it limited each posting to one hundred and forty characters

means.word_mean: 成功的; 如愿以偿的; 达到目的;有成就的;有成效的

sentences.cn: 她是一位很成功的女实业家。

sentences.en: He was successful in his studies.

jushi.english: They're advertising luxury apartments ideal for the successful young executive.
jushi.chinese: 他们正在推销豪华的公寓住宅,是飞黄腾达的年轻商务人员的理想居所。

jushi.english: Her successful jump brought a spontaneous cheer from the crowd.
jushi.chinese: 她成功越过横竿后,观众立即发出一阵欢呼声。

jushi.english: The prime minister staked his reputation on a successful outcome to the amrs talks.
jushi.chinese: 首相拿自己的声誉担保军备谈判将会成功。
